layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 627x50 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 625x48
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 625x44
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 621x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=2]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 590x39
                text run at (2,2) width 413: "This is some text, this is some text, this is some text, this is some text "
                text run at (415,2) width 177: "This is some text, this is some"
                text run at (2,22) width 228: "text, this is some text, this is some text"
